                    UnknownProp = {358 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,4 } Begin
                        0x01000000

                        0x01000000

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
  ' The db Open statements in this code give type mismatch error unless
  ' the folow references and priority of references  is set in the Visual
  ' Basic Tools option. References and list sequence (priority) must be:
  ' Visual Basic for   Applications
  ' Microsoft Access 9.0 Library
  ' Microsoft Office 9.0 Library
  ' OLE Automation
  ' Microsoft DAO 3.6 Obj Lib
  ' Microsoft Visual Basic of Application Extensibility 5.3
  '  Others as needed
  Dim fyear As Integer
  Dim firstYrChange As Boolean
  Dim msg As String
  Dim msgall As String
  Dim Title As String
  Dim dbsSciFair As Database
  Dim ExhDataRS As Recordset
  Dim TeacherRS As Recordset
  Dim personsRS As Recordset
  Dim ProtocolsRS As Recordset
  Dim ExhData As Recordset
  Dim SchEntRS As Recordset
  Dim criteria As String
  Dim ExhStudRs As Recordset
  Dim exhjudrs  As Recordset
  Dim FairInfoRS As Recordset
  Dim ehaddata As Integer
  Dim shaddata As Integer
  Dim jhaddata As Integer
  Dim phaddata As Integer

Private Function GetYear() As Integer
 Dim boxin As String
 Dim yearin As Integer
 On Error GoTo inputerror
DoAgain:
    boxin = InputBox("Enter Fair Year (nnnn)")
    yearin = boxin
    If yearin < 1980 Or yearin > 9999 Then
      MsgBox ("Not a valid Year, Reenter!")
      GoTo DoAgain
    End If
    GetYear = yearin
    Exit Function
inputerror:
    If boxin = "" Then
      GetYear = 0
      Exit Function
    End If
    Resume
End Function
Private Sub CreateFYR()
   Dim Fairname As String
   Dim Exhibitsloc As String
   Dim Firstaddexhibit As Long
   Dim Nextaddexhbitit As Long
   Dim Webdatapath As String
   With FairInfoRS
   .FindFirst "[Fair_Year] = " & (fyear - 1)
   If .NoMatch = False Then   ' DES 4.0.4
      ' get stuff to add to new record
       
       Fairname = !FAIR_NAME
       Exhibitsloc = "Not Determined"
       Firstaddexhibit = 100001     '!FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT
       Nextaddexhbitit = 100001     '!NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT
       Webdatapath = !WebdbPath
   Else
      ' get stuff to add to new record   'DES 4.0.4
       Fairname = "Not Determined"
       Exhibitsloc = "Not Determined"
       Firstaddexhibit = 100001
       Nextaddexhbitit = 100001
       Webdatapath = ""
   
   End If
   .FindFirst "[Fair_Year] = " & fyear  ' rev 2.3.3
   If .NoMatch Then
     .AddNew
     !FAIR_YEAR = fyear
      !FAIR_NAME = Fairname
      !EXHIBITS_LOC = Exhibitsloc            'DES 4.0.4 add these 4 items
     ' !FIRST_ADD_EXHIBIT = Firstaddexhibit  ' Not needed, these two set by default
     ' !NEXT_ADD_EXHIBIT = Nextaddexhbitit   ' for any new record
      !WebdbPath = Webdatapath
     .Update
     ' Rev 2.3.1
     MsgBox "New Record has been added to 'FairInfo' table for " & fyear & vbCrLf & _
          "The user must input 'most' data for year " & fyear & " " & vbCrLf & _
          "Including the path to the website - WebdbPath" & vbCrLf & _
          "Remember to input these details NOW, Don't Wait!" & vbCrLf & _
          "ALSO: Go to all PCs and do the next step NOW, Don't Wait!" & vbCrLf & _
          " ** Set FairYear on all copies of SciFairMaster and SciFairSlave!  **", vbOKOnly
   
   Else  ' Rev 2.3.3
        ' Rev 2.3.3
        MsgBox "A Record already exists in 'FairInfo' table for " & fyear & vbCrLf & _
          "The user must verify/input 'most' data for year " & fyear & " " & vbCrLf & _
          "Including the path to the website - WebdbPath" & vbCrLf & _
          "Remember to input/verify these details NOW, Don't Wait!" & vbCrLf & _
          "ALSO: Go to all PCs and do the next step NOW, Don't Wait!" & vbCrLf & _
          " ** Set FairYear on all copies of SciFairMaster and SciFairSlave!  **", vbOKOnly
   End If
   End With
End Sub
Private Sub Setdate(btn_num As Integer)
   criteria = "date" & btn_num
   With FairInfoRS
     .FindFirst "[Fair_Year] = " & fyear
     If .NoMatch Then
       CreateFYR   ' If setting fairyear and the record does not exists then
                  ' I ASSUME that this is the last step of FairMaintenance and
                  ' So I will create the new entry into FairInfo.
       .FindFirst "[fair_year] = " & fyear
     End If
     If Not .NoMatch Then
       .Edit
        Select Case btn_num
        Case 1
          !M_Date1 = Date
          Me.date1.SetFocus
          Me.date1.Value = Date
        Case 2
          !M_Date2 = Date
          Me.date2.SetFocus
          Me.date2.Value = Date
        Case 3
          !M_Date3 = Date
          Me.date3.SetFocus
          Me.date3.Value = Date
        Case 4
          !M_Date4 = Date
          Me.date4.SetFocus
          Me.date4.Value = Date
        Case 5
          !M_Date5 = Date
          Me.date5.SetFocus
          Me.date5.Value = Date
        Case 6
          !M_Date6 = Date
          Me.date6.SetFocus
          Me.date6.Value = Date
        Case 7  ' record the date that we first changed fair year  Rev 2.3.1.
          If Format(!M_Date7, "yyyy") = "" Then ' Only enter date ONCE - first time change FYR
            '  MsgBox !m_date7 & " Was Null Entered date of change"
            If Format(!M_Date6, "yyyy") = "" Then  ' Rev 2.3.3 233
               If MsgBox("Seems You are setting Fair Year out of sequence." & vbCrLf & _
                "Previous Fair Maintenance step(s) have not all been accomplished!" & vbCrLf & _
                "Do You Really want to enter todays date as the date you changed the Fair Year?" & vbCrLf & _
                "Normally you should answer NO ", _
                vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
            End If
           
               !M_Date7 = Date
               Me.date7.SetFocus
               Me.date7.Value = Date
        
          Else
            '  MsgBox "Had data = " & !m_date7 & " no change to FYR change date"
            Exit Sub ' Rev 2.3.3   do not update  m_laststep
          End If
     '   Case 8
     '     !m_date8 = Date
     '     Me.date8.SetFocus
     '     Me.date8.Value = Date
        End Select
        !M_LastStep = btn_num
       .Update
       Me.lastaction = btn_num
     Else
       MsgBox "Can not find or create FairYear record for " & fyear
       Exit Sub
     End If
   End With
End Sub
Private Function CheckExhibits() As Boolean 'See if ExhibitStudens has records ----
  On Error GoTo SubError
    Dim ExhStudRs As Recordset
    Set ExhStudRs = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("ExhibitStudents", dbOpenDynaset)
    If ExhStudRs.EOF Then
       CheckExhibits = False
       Exit Function
    End If
    CheckExhibits = True
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
  CheckExhibits = False
End Function
Private Sub btn1_Click() '--- UDATE SCHOOL ENTRIES ---------
  On Error GoTo SubError
   If Not CheckExhibits Then
     MsgBox "ERROR: No ExhibitStudent Records! " & vbCrLf & _
            " Can not run this step without Exhibits!"
     Exit Sub
   End If
   '  --------------------- UPDATE SchoolEntries from ExhibitsData -----------
   msg = "UPDATE SchoolEntries (previous fair's statistics)" & vbCrLf & _
         "APPENDS exhibits count data to SchoolEntries table" & vbCrLf & _
         " for fair year " & fyear & "." & vbCrLf & _
         "Note: Updates assume previous fair's year was " & fyear & vbCrLf & _
         "Do you want to UPDATE THE SCHOOL ENTRIES TABLE?"
   resp = MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
   If resp = vbNo Then Exit Sub
     ' open School Entries
     Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
     ' OPEN the Table -----------------
     Set SchEntRS = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("SchoolEntries", _
                     dbOpenDynaset)
     criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
                     " ORDER BY [SCH_CODE]"
     'criteria = "[ExhibitData]"
     
     Set ExhData = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
     ' For each SCH_CODE in ExhibitsData, Find the totals
      ' and make a record in the SchoolsEntries table
     If Not SchEntRS.EOF Then ' just opened should not be EOF unless empty
       With SchEntRS
         .MoveFirst
          Do While Not .EOF
           If !FYR = fyear Then
             msg = "There are already records for Fair Year " & fyear & _
                vbCrLf & "In SchoolEntries Table! " & vbCrLf & _
              "Do you want to Replace the " & fyear & " SchoolEntries Records?"
             resp = MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
             If resp = vbYes Then
               .MoveFirst
                 Do While Not .EOF
                   If !FYR = fyear Then
                     .Delete
                   End If
                   .MoveNext
                 Loop
               Exit Do
             Else
               MsgBox "No Action taken"
               Exit Sub
             End If
           End If
         .MoveNext
         Loop
       End With
     End If
     With ExhData
     If .EOF Then
       MsgBox "ExhibitsData has no data for fairyear " & fyear & vbCrLf & "NO Action Taken!"
       ' Setdate (1)
       Exit Sub
     Else  ' not EOF on Exhibits data so append to SchoolEntries
      .MoveFirst
      schcode = -1  ' set a value that will start the process
      Do While Not .EOF
        If Not IsNull(!SCH_CODE) Then  ' REV 2.3.2  03/13/06   was SCH_CODE not !SCH_CODE did
                                       ' if had a null overflowed table with entries
                                       ' SCH_CODE is empty,  !SCH_CODE is Null
          totalexhibits = 0
          tostate = 0
          alternates = 0
          toisef = 0
          noShow = 0
          schcode = !SCH_CODE
          Do While (Not IsNull(!SCH_CODE)) _
                                And (schcode = !SCH_CODE)
             totalexhibits = totalexhibits + 1
             If UCase(!TO_STATE) = "Y" Then
               tostate = tostate + 1
             End If
             If UCase(!TO_STATE) = "A" Then
               alternates = alternates + 1
             End If
             If Not IsNull(!TO_ISEF) Then   ' rev 540  TO_ISEF contains the raning 1,2,3 and for
              '  junior exhibits select to observe 100, 101, 102... etc.
              '  so I will just have to count the number selected (may have not attended)
              'If UCase(!TO_ISEF) = "Y" Then  ' rev 540   the new ISEF field contains the ranking

               toisef = toisef + 1
             End If
             If !TO_STATE = "N" Then    ' rev 540   this was changed a few years back, did not catch
             'If !SCORE = 0 Then
               noShow = noShow + 1
             End If
             .MoveNext
             If .EOF Then Exit Do ' GoTo foundeof
          Loop
          ' update SchoolsEnt here
          With SchEntRS
            .AddNew
            !SCH_CODE = schcode
            !FYR = fyear
            !Total_Exhibits = totalexhibits
            !TO_STATE = tostate
            !alternates = alternates
            !TO_ISEF = toisef
            !No_Shows = noShow
            .Update
          End With
        Else
         .MoveNext ' SCH_CODE was a null so just continue
        End If
      Loop
      .Close
      MsgBox "SchoolsEntries HAS BEEN UPDATED WITH " & fyear & " DATA!"
     End If  ' if .EOF on Exhbitisdata
     End With
     SchEntRS.Close
  Setdate (1)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btn2_Click()  '  ---Clean up Last_Fair year in Students table
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If Not CheckExhibits Then
     MsgBox "ERROR: No ExhibitStudent Records! " & vbCrLf & _
            " Can not (MUST NOT) run this step without Exhibits!"
     Exit Sub
   End If
  If Not IsNull(Me.date2) Then ' has a date so have already done this once
     If MsgBox("It seems you Have Already Executed this step! (see date)" & vbCrLf & _
               "If you execute again it will ADD another duplicate" & vbCrLf & _
               "note to the end of persons.comment. Not a disaster but" & vbCrLf & _
               "NOT RECOMMENDED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
               "RUN THIS STEP ANYWAY?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  End If
  Dim ExhStudswoGradeRS As Recordset
  criteria = "SELECT ExhibitStudents.EXN, Students.GRADE, Persons.LNAME " & _
             "FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN (ExhibitStudents LEFT JOIN Students ON " & _
             "ExhibitStudents.STID = Students.STID) ON Persons.PID = Students.PID " & _
             "WHERE Students.GRADE Is Null OR Students.Grade > 12 " & _
             "OR Students.Grade < 6 ORDER BY ExhibitStudents.EXN;"
  Set ExhStudswoGradeRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  With ExhStudswoGradeRS
    If Not .EOF Then  ' Have records so must exit
       Dim rc As Integer
       rc = 0
       criteria = "WARNING: You must set Grade for all students in ExhibitStudents!" & _
                   "ExhibitStudents with Blank/Bad Grade" & vbCrLf & _
                   "EXN  Grade LNAME"
       .MoveFirst
       Do While Not .EOF
          rc = rc + 1
          criteria = criteria & vbCrLf & Format(!EXN, "0000") & "     " & _
                     !GRADE & IIf(IsNull(!GRADE), "  ", "") & "      " & !LNAME
          If rc > 10 Then
            criteria = criteria & vbCrLf & _
                "** There are more than can be listed here!"
            Exit Do
          End If
          .MoveNext
       Loop
       criteria = criteria & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & "Use Query 'xExhibit Students w/o Grade'" & _
                 vbCrLf & "to enter/correct these grades!"
       MsgBox criteria
       Exit Sub
    End If
  End With
   If MsgBox("This routine Cleans up Last_Fair field in Students Table by:" & vbCrLf & _
     " 1. Sets Last_Fair to " & FairYear() & " for all ExhibitStudents entries for " & _
       FairYear & vbCrLf & _
     " 2. Adds '" & FairYear() & " EXN: xxxx' to the end of the persons.comment" & vbCrLf & _
     "    for all Exhibit Students entries for " & FairYear() & vbCrLf & _
     " 3. Sets Last_Fair = Null for any students with Last_Fair set to " & _
       FairYear() & vbCrLf & _
     "    but NOT IN ExhibitStudents. (i.e. protocols that never entered, " & vbCrLf & _
     "    exhibits that were deleted, duplicate entries and other errors." & vbCrLf & _
     " All students with Last_Fair = null will then be deleted later." & vbCrLf & _
     "  (In step 6 'Remove Students')" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
     " DO YOU WISH TO PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
   MsgBox "Two update queries will now run."
   DoCmd.RunMacro ("xUpdate Last_Fair")
  resp = MsgBox("IF YOU SAW NO ERRORS, Students.Last_Fair HAS BEEN UPDATED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
          "(Updating 0 records in the second query was NOT and error!)" & vbCrLf & _
         "Did the process complete without errors?", vbYesNo, Title)
  If resp = vbYes Then
    Setdate (2)
  Else
    MsgBox "Running this step again without restoring SciFairData" & vbCrLf & _
           "will add duplicate comments at the end of persons.comments!" & vbCrLf & _
           "You should restore SciFairData and " & vbcrelf & _
           "fix errors/problems and then Re-run this step (if you say errors)"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btn3_Click()  ' ---------Update Awards ------------
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If Not IsNull(Me.date3) Then ' has a date so have already done this once
     If MsgBox("It seems you Have Already Executed this step! (see date)" & vbCrLf & _
               "Since all awards have been set inactive, re-executing the step" & vbCrLf & _
               "will not have any effect. Not a disaster but" & vbCrLf & _
               "NOT RECOMMENDED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
               "RUN THIS STEP ANYWAY?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  End If
  If MsgBox("For 'A'ctive Awards, this Step Sets AwardMaster.Last_YR to " & vbCrLf & _
            FairYear() & " and increments Awardmaster.Num_YR." & vbCrLf & _
            "It then sets AwardMaster.Status = blank for ALL Awards." & vbCrLf & _
            "AND .. Sets the winning exhibit number (EXN) and student" & vbCrLf & _
            "number (Stud_Num) in AwardPrize to zero except for Special Headings." & vbCrLf & _
            "  (i.e. if Type = 'S', leave EXN as set.)" & vbCrLf & _
            "PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  DoCmd.RunMacro "xNewYr Update Awards Num_Yr"
  resp = MsgBox("IF YOU SAW NO ERRORS, Awards HAVE BEEN UPDATED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         "Did the process complete without errors?", vbYesNo, Title)
  If resp = vbYes Then
    Setdate (3)
  Else
    MsgBox "You may want to Restore SciFairData and/or " & vbcrelf & _
           "fix errors/problems and/or Re-run this step"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btn4_Click()   ' -------- UPDATE JUDGES ______
  On Error GoTo SubError
   '  -----------  CLEAN and UPDATE THE JUDGES DATA ---------------------
  If Not IsNull(Me.date4) Then ' has a date so have already done this once
     If MsgBox("It seems you Have Already Executed this step! (see date)" & vbCrLf & _
               "Since all Judges have been set inactive, re-executing the step" & vbCrLf & _
               "will increment Num_YRs for Chairs AGAIN, and other bad results!" & vbCrLf & _
               "NOT.. NOT RECOMMENDED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
               "RUN THIS STEP ANYWAY?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  End If
   msg = "NOTE: It would be advisable to do a backup of SciFairData FIRST!" & _
      vbCrLf & "THIS UPDATES AND PREPARES JUDGES DATA" & vbCrLf & _
      "This Process produces the following results: " & vbCrLf & _
      " Adds 'NO SHOW " & Fairyr & "' at the END of Judges.COMMENT" & _
                                          "if Judges.STATUS= 'N'" & vbCrLf & _
      " Increments Judges.NUM_YR for Status 'Active' or 'Late Reg'('A' or 'L')" & vbCrLf & _
      " Increments Judges.NUM_YR for CHAIRS and Assistant Chairs" & vbCrLf & _
      " Clears Judges.STATUS in all records! (ready for new year)" & vbCrLf _
       & vbCrLf & _
       "This Process will run the Macro xNewYr Update Judges Num_Yrs" & _
       vbCrLf & "The Macro contains 7 (or more) Update Queries!" & vbCrLf & _
      "THIS PROCESS REQUIRES THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS: " & vbCrLf & _
      " For judges active in " & fyear & ", Judges.STATUS = 'A' or 'L'" & vbCrLf & _
      " For 'no show' judges in " & fyear & ", Judges.STATUS = 'N'" & vbCrLf & _
      " Table 'Chairs' references the JUN of Chairs that worked in " & fyear _
         & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
      "UPDATE AND PREPARE JUDGES DATA? (All Settings OK)"
  resp = MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
  If resp = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  ' would be good to put checks here Are any status = 'A' Active?
  '    are any status = "n" etc.
  ' The command to run a macro.
  DoCmd.RunMacro ("xNewYr Update Judges Num_Yr")
  resp = MsgBox("IF YOU SAW NO ERRORS, Judges HAS BEEN UPDATED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         "Did the process complete without errors?", vbYesNo, Title)
  If resp = vbYes Then
    Setdate (4)
  Else
    MsgBox "You may want to Restore SciFairData and/or " & vbcrelf & _
           "fix errors/problems and/or Re-run this step"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btn5_Click()  '------   REMOVE EXHIBITS ETC. ------------
  On Error GoTo SubError
   ' ----------  REMOVE ExhibitsData, ExhibitsJudges, ExhibitStudents  ---
   '                    And Protocols
  'resp = MsgBox(msgall, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, title)
  'If resp = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  If IsNull(Me.date1) Or IsNull(Me.date2) Then
     MsgBox "Steps 1 and 2 MUST be completed FIRST!"
     Exit Sub
  End If
 
 msg = "NOTE: It would be advisable to do a backup of SciFairData FIRST!" & _
       "THIS WILL REMOVE " & fyear & " EXHIBIT DATA AS FOLLOWS:" & vbCrLf & _
      " * Remove " & fyear & " data in ExhibitJudges (judge assignements)" & vbCrLf & _
      " * Remove " & fyear & " data in tables: " & vbCrLf & _
      "     ExhibitData and ExhibitStudents. " & vbCrLf & _
      " * Remove ALL data in Protocols table. " & vbCrLf & _
      " Notes: If the year listed is wrong, Change Fair Year." & vbCrLf & _
      "        Students and Persons data is left in data base." & vbCrLf & _
      "Do you want to REMOVE THE ABOVE EXHIBIT'S DATA NOW? "
   resp = MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
   If resp = vbNo Then Exit Sub  ' DO this before we set the new year.
     ' Open Tables and check FYR in each.
     Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
     ' OPEN the Tables -----------------
     ' get ALL records for ExhibitJudges (judges assignements, scorecards)
     criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitJudges] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
                " ORDER BY [EXN]"
     Set exhjudrs = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
     Set ProtocolsRS = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset("Protocols", dbOpenDynaset)
     ' get only student exhibits data (not special or teacher's entries)
     criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
                " ORDER BY [EXN]"
     Set ExhDataRS = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
     ' get only student for EXN > 100  (i.e. not special or teachers stuff_
     criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitStudents] WHERE [FYR] = " & fyear & _
           " ORDER BY [EXN]"
     Set ExhStudRs = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
     jhaddata = 0
     resp = MsgBox("CAUTION: SURE? " & vbCrLf & _
                    "Remove " & fyear & " ExhibitJudges records?" & vbCrLf & _
                    "(Judge Assignments, not Judges)", _
                       vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
     If resp = vbYes Then
      jhaddata = 1
      With exhjudrs         ' Note rev 5.3.0  This did not remove judge assigns with wrong fair year
      If Not .EOF Then
        jhaddata = 2
        .MoveFirst
        Do While Not .EOF
        .Delete
        .MoveNext
        Loop
      End If
      End With
     End If
     shaddata = 0
     ehaddata = 0
     phaddata = 0
     resp = MsgBox("CAUTION: SURE? " & vbCrLf & _
                    "Remove " & fyear & " ExhibitData and ExhibitStudents records " & vbCrLf & _
                    " Student links (not students) and Exhibits?", _
                    vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
     If resp = vbYes Then
      shaddata = 1
      With ExhStudRs
      If Not .EOF Then
        shaddata = 2
        .MoveFirst
        Do While Not .EOF
        .Delete
        .MoveNext
        Loop
      End If
      End With
      ehaddata = 1
      With ExhDataRS
      If Not .EOF Then
        ehaddata = 2
        .MoveFirst
        Do While Not .EOF
        .Delete
        .MoveNext
        Loop
      End If
      End With
      ' Note: do not allow delete protocols unless delete exhibits since
      ' some records would not delete since linked to exhibits.
      resp = MsgBox("CAUTION: SURE? " & vbCrLf & _
                    "Remove ALL Protocols records?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
      If resp = vbYes Then
        phaddata = 1
        With ProtocolsRS
        If Not .EOF Then
         phaddata = 2
         .MoveFirst
         Do While Not .EOF
         .Delete
         .MoveNext
         Loop
        End If
        End With
      End If
     End If
     msg = "You skipped--> "
     If phaddata = 0 Then
       msg = msg & " Protocols, "
     End If
     If shaddata = 0 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitStudents, "
     End If
     If jhaddata = 0 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitJudges, "
     End If
     If ehaddata = 0 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitData"
     End If
     msg = msg & vbCrLf & "You Emptied--> "
     If phaddata = 2 Then
       msg = msg & " Protocols, "
     End If
     If shaddata = 2 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitStudents, "
     End If
     If jhaddata = 2 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitJudges, "
     End If
     If ehaddata = 2 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitData"
     End If
     msg = msg & vbCrLf & "Already Empty--> "
     If phaddata = 1 Then
       msg = msg & " Protocols, "
     End If
     If shaddata = 1 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitStudents, "
     End If
     If jhaddata = 1 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitJudges, "
     End If
     If ehaddata = 1 Then
       msg = msg & " " & fyear & " ExhibitData"
     End If
     If phaddata = 0 Or shaddata = 0 Or jhaddata = 0 Or ehaddata = 0 Then
      msg = msg & vbCrLf & "YOU SKIPPED ITEMS, " & vbCrLf & _
        "Date of action not updated!" & vbCrLf & _
        "REPEAT and do skipped items later!"
     Else
       Setdate (5)
     End If
     MsgBox msg
     ExhDataRS.Close
     exhjudrs.Close
     ExhStudRs.Close
     ProtocolsRS.Close
     ' All this code was a first attempt.  i leave it commented out
     ' because it has some learnings.   I.E. code that may be useful later
     ' DoCmd.CopyObject "SciFairExhibits" & fyear, "Exhibits" & fyear, _
     '         acTable, "Exhibits"
     '   DoCmd.CopyObject , "StudentsCopy", acTable, "Students"
     '  DoCmd.DeleteObject acTable, "StudentsCopy"
         ' Empty the tables
     '      DoCmd.OpenTable "Exhibits"
     '      DoCmd.RunCommand acCmdSelectAllRecords
     '      DoCmd.RunCommand acCmdDeleteRecord
     '      DoCmd.Close acTable, "Exhibits"
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btn6_Click()  ' ---------- DELETE 12th grade/older Students ----
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If CheckExhibits Then  ' have exhibitStudents - can not delete students
    MsgBox "ERROR:  ExhibitStudents has records!" & vbcrfl & _
           "You must first Empty ExhibitData, ExhibitStudents," & vbCrLf & _
           "ExhibitJudges and Protocols (Step 5)!"
    Exit Sub
  End If
  Dim pd As Long
  Dim ln As String
  Dim YearsToHold6graders As Integer
  '  CHANGE THIS IF YOU WANT TO CHANGE THE NUMBER OF YEARS TO HOLD DATA
  years6grd = 6  'Program calculates other grades based on this
  '  --------------------------------------------------------------
  Dim StudentsRS As Recordset
  Dim personsRS As Recordset
  Dim StudPerRS As Recordset
  Dim TestYr As Integer
  Dim holdpid As Long
  TestYr = FairYear() - (years6grd + 6) 'Delete IF last_fair - grade <= TestYr
  If IsNull(Me.date1) Or IsNull(Me.date2) Or IsNull(Me.date5) Then
     MsgBox "Steps 1,2 and 5 MUST be completed FIRST!"
     Exit Sub
  End If
  If MsgBox("NOTE: It would be advisable to do a backup of SciFairData FIRST!" & _
         "This step REMOVES STUDENTS AND PERSONS RECORDS. " & vbCrLf & _
         "It would be a good idea to BACKUP SciFairData FIRST!" & vbCrLf & _
         "   " & vbCrLf & _
         "This step does the following actions:" & vbCrLf & _
         " 1. Removes Students and Persons with blank (Null) Student.Last_Fair." & vbCrLf & _
         "    (These are students with protocols in " & FairYear() & " but " & vbCrLf & _
         "     with NO exhibit, students left in tables after deleting an" & vbCrLf & _
         "     exhibit, duplicate and error entries in " & FairYear() & " without" & vbCrLf & _
         "     links to exhibits, and those where YOU SET Last_Fair BLANK." & vbCrLf & _
         " 2. Removes Students (and Persons) who have GRADUATED! " & vbCrLf & _
         "    i.e. 12th graders (ALL)" & vbCrLf & _
         "          6th graders with Last_Fair of " & FairYear() - Years6thgrd - 6 & " or older.   " & vbCrLf & _
         "          7th graders with Last_Fair of " & FairYear() - Years6thgrd - 5 & " or older.   " & vbCrLf & _
         "         10th graders with Last_Fair of " & FairYear() - Years6thgrd - 2 & " or older. " & vbCrLf & _
         "    etc. - Removes Students where (Last_Fair + " & 6 + years6grd & " - Grade) is <=" & FairYear() & "." & vbCrLf & _
         " 3. Cleans Person.TP field (Changes 'ET' & 'PT' to 'TH'  and 'PS' to 'ES'" & vbCrLf & _
         "         etc." & vbCrLf & _
         " DO YOU WISH TO PROCEED?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  ' OK TO GO ON! --------------------------------------------------------------
  If MsgBox("This will take several seconds - be patient.   " & vbCrLf & _
    "DELETE STUDENTS who have graduated?", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
  Screen.MousePointer = 11   'Hourglass
  
  'Delete IF last_fair - grade <= testyr
  'criteria = "SELECT Persons.*, Students.* " & _
  '           "FROM Students Where [Last_Fair] Is Null LEFT JOIN Persons ON Students.PID = Persons.PID;"
  criteria = "SELECT Persons.PID as P_PID, Persons.*, Students.PID as S_PID, Students.* " & _
             "FROM Students " & _
             "LEFT JOIN Persons ON Students.PID = Persons.PID " & _
             "Where [Last_Fair] Is Null OR [Last_Fair] - [Grade] <= " & _
             TestYr & ";"

  Set personsRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Persons", dbOpenDynaset)
  Set StudPerRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  With StudPerRS
  If Not .EOF Then
    .MoveFirst
    Dim i As Integer
    i = 0
    Do While Not .EOF  ' do each reacord
        Dim gd As Integer
        Dim lf As Integer
        Dim test As Integer
        lf = IIf(IsNull(!LAST_FAIR), 0, !LAST_FAIR)
        gd = IIf(IsNull(!GRADE), 0, !GRADE)
  'Delete IF last_fair - grade <= Testyr
        test = TestYr
        test = lf - gd       ' del if < = EquivYear
        test = lf + 12 - gd  ' del if <= 2002
        If IsNull(!P_PID) Then
          MsgBox "Deleting Student " & !STID & " with no PID (no link to persons)", _
          vbInformation, "DeleteStudents"
          .Delete
        Else
          holdpid = !P_PID
          .Delete
          With personsRS
           .FindFirst "PID = " & holdpid
           If Not .NoMatch Then
               pd = !PID
               ln = !LNAME
               On Error GoTo DeleteFail
               .Delete
               On Error GoTo SubError
           End If
          End With
         End If
         i = i + 1
        .MoveNext
    Loop
  End If 'if not .EOF
  End With
   MsgBox "Deleted " & i & " Students and Persons"
  With personsRS
    Dim tpfld As String
    Dim holdTP As String
    Dim Errcnt As Long
    Dim Erroneperson As Boolean
    Dim Changeoneperson As Boolean
    Dim Changecnt As Long
    Errcnt = 0
    Changecnt = 0
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
      Erroneperson = False
      Changeoneperson = False
      tpfld = IIf(IsNull(!TP), "", !TP)
      ' **************  change PT to TH
      holdTP = tpfld
      Call ClearFieldTP(tpfld, "PT")  ' if has PT then remove it
      If tpfld = "error" Then
        Erroneperson = True
        Errcnt = Errcnt + 1
        tpfld = holdTP
      Else '  no error so see if changed
        If tpfld <> holdTP Then  '  PT was removed
          Call setFieldTP(tpfld, "TH") ' set TH if not set already
          Changeoneperson = True
          Changecnt = Changecnt + 1
        End If
      End If
      ' **************  change ET to TH
      holdTP = tpfld
      Call ClearFieldTP(tpfld, "ET")  ' if has ET then remove it
      If tpfld = "error" Then
        If Erroneperson = False Then
           Errcnt = Errcnt + 1
           Erroneperson = True
        End If
        tpfld = holdTP
      Else '  no error so see if changed
        If tpfld <> holdTP Then  '  ET was removed
          Call setFieldTP(tpfld, "TH") ' set TH if not set already
          If Changeoneperson = False Then
            Changeoneperson = True
            Changecnt = Changecnt + 1
          End If
        End If
      End If
      ' **************  change PS to ES
      holdTP = tpfld
      Call ClearFieldTP(tpfld, "PS")  ' if has PS then remove it
      If tpfld = "error" Then
        If Erroneperson = False Then
           Errcnt = Errcnt + 1
           Erroneperson = True
        End If
        tpfld = holdTP
      Else '  no error so see if changed
        If tpfld <> holdTP Then  '  PS was removed
          Call setFieldTP(tpfld, "ES") ' set ES if not set already
          If Changeoneperson = False Then
            Changeoneperson = True
            Changecnt = Changecnt + 1
          End If
        End If
      End If
      If Changeoneperson = True Then
        .Edit
        !TP = tpfld
        .Update
      End If
      .MoveNext
    Loop
    MsgBox "Persons.TP field cleaned" & vbCrLf & _
           " Number Good Changes = " & Changecnt & vbCrLf & _
           " Number of Persons with Bad TP field " & vbCrLf & _
           "   (i.e. not xx,xx,xx format) =  " & Errcnt
  End With
  personsRS.Close
  StudPerRS.Close
  Screen.MousePointer = 0 ' Default
  resp = MsgBox("Students HAVE BEEN CLEANED!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         " (Unless you saw exceptions - which you need to do maunually.)" & vbCrLf & _
         "DID THE PROCESS COMPLETE TO YOUR SATISFACTION?", vbYesNo, Title)
  If resp = vbYes Then
    Setdate (6)
  Else
    MsgBox "You may want to Restore SciFairData and/or " & vbcrelf & _
           "fix errors/problems and/or Re-run this step"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
    Screen.MousePointer = 0   'Default
  Exit Sub
DeleteFail:
  Screen.MousePointer = 0   'Default
  MsgBox Err.Description & vbCrLf & "PID = " & pd & " LNAME: " & ln & vbCrLf & _
         "NOTE: This is NOT an ERROR - just a notice" & vbCrLf & _
         "  (You may want to make a note and delete this later.)"
  Screen.MousePointer = 11 ' Default
  Resume Next
End Sub
Private Sub btn7_Click()  '  ------SET FAIR YEAR --------------------------
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If InStr(1, CurrentDb.Name, "FairMaster") > 0 Then ' For SciFairMaster Only
  msg = "Fair Year should be the 'year' of the Fair you are " & vbCrLf & _
         "PREPARING FOR (pre-fair) OR MAINTAINING (post-fair). " & vbCrLf & _
         "You normally change the Fair Year AFTER you complete all other" & vbCrLf & _
         "'Maintenance' tasks on this form but before Website Cleanup.  " & vbCrLf & _
        "Note: Access Fair Year with function FairYear()" & vbCrLf & _
         vbCrLf & "CHANGE FAIR YEAR NOW?"
  Else  ' SciFairSlave and other applications (not SciFairMaster)
    msg = "Fair Year should be the 'year' of the Fair you are" & vbCrLf & _
         "ENTERING DATA FOR." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         "CHANGE FAIR YEAR NOW?"
  End If
  resp = MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title)
  If resp = vbNo Then
    ' Exit Sub   rev 5.4.5   545
    GoTo ClrActionLog
  End If
  Dim nfyear As Integer
  Dim lfyear As Integer
  lfyear = fyear  ' save and hold the current setting
  nfyear = GetYear
  If nfyear = 0 Then
     MsgBox "Aborted or No entry" & vbCrLf & "No Action Taken!"
     Exit Sub
  End If
  If nfyear = fyear + 1 Then
    Setdate (7) ' fill in the scifair maintenence date info but only if not already entered
                ' Rev 2.3.1.
                ' setdate uses fyear
    fyear = nfyear
  Else
    If MsgBox("You did not increment the year!" & vbCrLf & _
           "Do you REALLY want to set the value " & nfyear & vbCrLf & _
           "for fairyear (i.e. for tests)?", vbYesNo) = vbNo Then Exit Sub
     ' do not setdate(7)
     fyear = nfyear
  End If
  CurrentDb().Properties("FairYear") = fyear
  FillDates   ' Update dates in form.  if no entry in FairInfo table, create new record
  Me.lblTitle.Caption = "Data Base Maintenance for " & fyear & " Fair"

'
  Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitJudges] WHERE [FYR] <> " & fyear
  Set exhjudrs = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitData] WHERE [FYR] <> " & fyear
  Set ExhDataRS = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ExhibitStudents] WHERE [FYR] <> " & fyear
  Set ExhStudRs = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  If exhjudrs.EOF And ExhDataRS.EOF And ExhStudRs.EOF Then
    ' do nothing because there is NO data in the above tables or
    ' because any data entered has FYR = fyear (so data is OK for current fair year
    ' MsgBox "eof on all files"
  Else ' one or more have records not = to fyear so potential problem
   ' Rev 2.3.1.
     msg = "Warning: " & vbCrLf & _
          " 1. Any New Exhibits, Exhibit Students and Student entries will be added using FairYear " & fyear & vbCrLf & _
          " 2. Tables ExibitData, ExhibitStudents, Students and/or ExhibitJudges HAVE " & vbCrLf & _
          " CURRENT entries with FairYear values not set to " & fyear & "!" & vbCrLf & _
          " 3. If this is a temporary change of FairYear, do not edit any Exhibit data entries" & vbCrLf & _
          " and do not enter Exhibit data or ExhibitJudge data until fair year is set to the proper year." & vbCrLf & _
          " 4. Otherwise, you may want to check these tables, and if appropriate, edit any entries with" & vbCrLf & _
          " incorrect fair year enties. Hint: Edit E_FYR, ES_FYR, LAST_FAIR using Query xExhibits Edit, Add, Delete QRY "
    MsgBox msg, vbOKOnly, Title
    
  End If ' exhjudrs.EOF And ExhDataRS.EOF And ExhStudRs.EOF
  '  rev 5.4.5   545
ClrActionLog:
   If MsgBox("The ActionLog Table contains a history of many edits, changes, deletes Etc." & vbCrLf & _
            "  The history from last years data will probably not be needed for the new year." & vbCrLf & _
            " Do you want to clear the ActionLog Table? (recommended)", vbYesNo, "Clear ActionLog Table") = vbYes Then
           criteria = "SELECT * FROM [ActionLog]"
          Dim actlogrs As Recordset
          Set actlogrs = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
          actlogrs.MoveFirst
          Do While Not actlogrs.EOF
             actlogrs.Delete
             actlogrs.MoveNext
          Loop
          MsgBox "ActionLog Emptied!"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox "in suberror", vbOKOnly, "test"
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub btn8_Click()   ' rev 5.4.3  543
' backup scifairwebdata.mdb
' remove exhibit entries  (Empty EntryFormData table)
' remove Exhibit Scores   (Empty ExhibitScores table)
' create practice Data for Cat Chairs
'       Create exhibits and randome scores for ExhibitScores
'       Clean NatCatgories so Chairs can practice.
' Change SciFairYear to next year.
 On Error GoTo SubError

If MsgBox("Before you continue with this step make a copy of SciFairWebData.mdb!" & vbCrLf & _
        "You can do this step anytime. Only data in SciFairWebData.mdb is changed!" & vbCrLf & _
        "This process will do the following:" & vbCrLf & _
        " 1. Remove all the previous years Website Exhibits entries. (Empty table EntryFormData)" & vbCrLf & _
        " 2. Remove the previous years Website Judge Registrations. (Empty table JudgeData)" & vbCrLf & _
        "    Note: The Website Judges accounts including the table 'Judges' are not removed." & vbCrLf & _
        " 3. Remove Website ISEF votes data. (Empty table ISEFVotes.)" & vbCrLf & _
        " 4. Remove Website Exhibit scores/ranking data. (Empty table ExhibitScores)" & vbCrLf & _
        " 5. Create Website 'practice exhibit data' for Category Chairs practice." & vbCrLf & _
        "    - creates 20 Exhibits with dummy scores for each category in NatCategories" & vbCrLf & _
        " 6. Present other reminders." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
        "AFTER you BACKUP SciFairWebData.mdb - Click OK to continue!", vbOKCancel + vbDefaultButton2, "Clean up Website") = vbCancel Then
        Exit Sub
End If
If MsgBox("Continue with Website cleanup?", vbOKCancel + vbDefaultButton2, "Clean Website") = vbCancel Then Exit Sub
Dim msg As String
Dim rsLExh As Recordset
Dim RSTFairInfo As Recordset
Dim rsWebExhScores As Recordset
Dim rsWebEntries As Recordset
Dim rsWebJudgedata As Recordset
Dim rsWebNatCategories As Recordset
Dim rsWebISEFVotes As Recordset
Dim rsLCat As Recordset
Dim MyWebdbPath As String
Dim db As DAO.Database
Dim dbweb As DAO.Database
Set db = CurrentDb
' Note next assumes that WebdbPath is set... correctly after changed fairyear in step 7
Set RSTFairInfo = db.OpenRecordset("SELECT * FROM FairInfo WHERE Fair_Year = " & FairYear())
MyWebdbPath = RSTFairInfo!WebdbPath
RSTFairInfo.Close
Set dbweb = DBEngine.OpenDatabase(MyWebdbPath)
Set rsWebEntries = dbweb.OpenRecordset("Select * from EntryFormData")  ' Get all fields
If rsWebEntries.RecordCount > 0 Then
  rsWebEntries.MoveLast
  rsWebEntries.MoveFirst
  If MsgBox("Remove " & rsWebEntries.RecordCount & " Records from table EntryFormData?", vbYesNo, "Empty Entries") = vbYes Then
    With rsWebEntries
         Do While Not .EOF
          .Delete
          .MoveNext
        Loop
    End With
    MsgBox "Emptied table EntryFormData!"
  End If
Else
  MsgBox "EntryFormData Already Empty"
End If
rsWebEntries.Close
Set rsWebJudgedata = dbweb.OpenRecordset("Select * from JudgeData")  ' Get all fields
If rsWebJudgedata.RecordCount > 0 Then
  rsWebJudgedata.MoveLast
  rsWebJudgedata.MoveFirst
  If MsgBox("Remove " & rsWebJudgedata.RecordCount & " Records from table Judgedata?", vbYesNo, "Empty Entries") = vbYes Then
    With rsWebJudgedata
         Do While Not .EOF
          .Delete
          .MoveNext
        Loop
    End With
    MsgBox "Emptied table Judgedata!"
  End If
Else
  MsgBox "Judgedata Already Empty"
End If
rsWebJudgedata.Close
' Empty ISEFVotes this here
Set rsWebISEFVotes = dbweb.OpenRecordset("Select * from ISEFVotes")  ' Get all fields
If rsWebISEFVotes.RecordCount > 0 Then
  rsWebISEFVotes.MoveLast
  rsWebISEFVotes.MoveFirst
  If MsgBox("Remove " & rsWebISEFVotes.RecordCount & " Records from table ISEFVotes?", vbYesNo, "Empty Entries") = vbYes Then
    With rsWebISEFVotes
         Do While Not .EOF
          .Delete
          .MoveNext
        Loop
    End With
    MsgBox "Emptied table ISEFVotes!"
  End If
Else
  MsgBox "ISEFVotes Already Empty"
End If
rsWebISEFVotes.Close
Set rsWebExhScores = dbweb.OpenRecordset("Select * from ExhibitScores")  ' Get all fields
Set rsWebNatCategories = dbweb.OpenRecordset("Select * from NatCategories")  ' Get all fields including RecToState
If rsWebExhScores.RecordCount > 0 Then
  rsWebExhScores.MoveLast
  rsWebExhScores.MoveFirst
  If MsgBox("Remove " & rsWebExhScores.RecordCount & " Records from table ExhibitScores?", vbYesNo, "Empty Entries") = vbYes Then
    With rsWebExhScores
         Do While Not .EOF
          .Delete
          .MoveNext
        Loop
    End With
    MsgBox "Emptied table ExhScores!"
  End If
Else
  MsgBox "ExhScoresAlready Empty"
End If
If MsgBox("Create ExhibitScores practice data?" & vbCrLf & _
    "  (Recommended)", vbYesNo, "Create Practice Data") = vbYes Then
   If rsWebExhScores.RecordCount > 0 Then
     rsWebExhScores.MoveLast
     rsWebExhScores.MoveFirst
     If MsgBox("You MUST empty the current data to create practice data!" & vbCrLf & _
         "Remove " & rsWebExhScores.RecordCount & " Records from table ExhibitScores?", vbYesNo, "Empty Entries") = vbYes Then
       With rsWebExhScores
         Do While Not .EOF
          .Delete
          .MoveNext
        Loop
       End With
       MsgBox "Emptied table ExhScores!"
     Else
       GoTo Skipped
     End If
   End If
   Dim i As Integer
   Dim firstex As Integer
   firstex = 101
   Do While Not rsWebNatCategories.EOF
       ' Set all to default except leave ToState and Alternates from previous year
        rsWebNatCategories.Edit
        rsWebNatCategories!InputFinal = False
        rsWebNatCategories!LastAcc = Null
        rsWebNatCategories!LastUpd = Now
        rsWebNatCategories!LastDld = Null
        rsWebNatCategories!FinalUpld = Now
        rsWebNatCategories!LocFinal = Null
        rsWebNatCategories!FinalToState = 0
        rsWebNatCategories!FinalAlt = 0
        rsWebNatCategories!recToState = 0
        rsWebNatCategories!RecAlt = 0
        rsWebNatCategories.Update
        For i = 0 To 19   ' create 20 exhibits
          rsWebExhScores.AddNew
          rsWebExhScores!NCAT = rsWebNatCategories!NCAT
          rsWebExhScores!Rank = i + 1
          rsWebExhScores!ExNo = i + firstex
          rsWebExhScores!Title = "Practice Exhibit Num: " & i + firstex
          If i = 19 Then
             rsWebExhScores!SCORE = 0
          Else
             rsWebExhScores!SCORE = 100 - i * 4
          End If
          If i = 19 Then
            rsWebExhScores!STATUS = "No Show"
          Else
            rsWebExhScores!STATUS = ""
          End If
          If i = 4 Or i = 11 Then
            rsWebExhScores!TeamEx = True
          Else
            rsWebExhScores!TeamEx = False
          End If
          rsWebExhScores.Update
        Next i
       rsWebNatCategories.MoveNext
       firstex = firstex + 100
   Loop
   MsgBox "Practice data created!  Here are some notes about the practice data:" & vbcrfl & _
   " - Practice data is set for only the previous years categories." & vbCrLf & _
   " - The data is in SciFairWebData.mdb table ExhibitScores." & vbCrLf & _
   " - Practice Exhibit numbers are not real (do not match actual category exhibit numbers)" & vbCrLf & _
   " - You may want to set new passwords for the Category Chairs - or Not." & vbCrLf & _
   " - You may want to remind the Category Chairs what the password is so they can practice." & vbCrLf & _
   "     (To change passwords, Log onto website as administrator and go to Manage Chairs"
Else
Skipped:
     MsgBox "No practice data created!"
End If
MsgBox "Reminders and information:" & vbCrLf & _
       " - Reminder: Change the FairYear on the Website (Log on as administrator)" & vbCrLf & _
       " - Reminder: Do an SQL Backup on the Website (Website Management -Log on as administrator)" & vbCrLf & _
       " - Reminder:  Change the chairs passwords on the Website (Log on as adminstrator)" & vbCrLf & _
       "              Let the chair persons know the new passwords." & vbCrLf & _
       " - Reminder: Run WebSite Sync Then:" & vbCrLf & _
       "    UPDATE Judges (Required so 'returning judges' can register with current data.)" & vbCrLf & _
       "    UPDATE Categories (So current years categories are available for Selection)" & vbCrLf & _
       "    UPDATE Schools/Teachers(So current years schools/teachers are available for Selection)" & vbCrLf & _
       "    Do SERC Backup. " & vbCrLf & _
       " - Info: Practice data (if any) can remain on the site until the morning of judging." & vbCrLf & _
       "     All practice data is removed when 'Judge Scores Entry' form initialization steps are performed." & vbCrLf & _
       "     You can remove practice data also by deleting all data from SciFairWebData ExhibitScores table."
rsWebExhScores.Close
rsWebNatCategories.Close
dbweb.Close
'rev 5.5.4 554 DES    set the check for max SciFairData size so user will do compact on next start
Dim test As Double
test = CurrentDb.Properties("SciFairDataMaxSize").Value  ' this will create the property if not set
 CurrentDb.Properties("SciFairDataMaxSize").Value = 2    ' Set to 2 so it will flag user to compact in form Startup
Exit Sub
SubError:
 MsgBox "Error cleaning website: " & Err.Description
 dbweb.Close
End Sub

Private Sub FillDates()
  firstYrChange = False
  With FairInfoRS
  
fillnow:
     .FindFirst "[Fair_Year] = " & fyear
     If Not .NoMatch Then
       Me.date1.Value = !M_Date1
       Me.date2.Value = !M_Date2
       Me.date3.Value = !M_Date3
       Me.date4.Value = !M_Date4
       Me.date5.Value = !M_Date5
       Me.date6.Value = !M_Date6
       Me.date7.Value = !M_Date7
       Me.lastaction.Value = !M_LastStep
     Else
       'MsgBox "Can not find FairYear record for " & fyear
       firstYrChange = True
       CreateFYR
       GoTo fillnow
     End If
  End With
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
On Error GoTo no_FairYearProperty
  fyear = CurrentDb().Properties("FairYear")
On Error GoTo SubError
  'DoCmd.Close acForm, "Startup"
  Set dbsSciFair = CurrentDb()
  criteria = "SELECT * FROM FairInfo "
  Set FairInfoRS = dbsSciFair.OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Me.lblTitle.Caption = "Data Base Maintenance for " & fyear & " Fair"
  Me.revdate.Value = RevisionDate 'revisiondate is a public variable in Functions
  Title = "Fair Maintenance"
  FillDates
'  msgall = "WAIT, CAUTION, READ THIS!" & vbCrLf & _
'   "IS 'FAIR YEAR' SET TO THE PREVIOUS FAIR'S YEAR?   " & vbCrLf & _
'   "When performing 'Maintanence' tasks the value of  " & vbCrLf & _
'   "'FairYear' (the year displayed in this form) " & vbCrLf & _
'   "must be set to the year of the PREVIOUS FAIR. " & vbCrLf & _
'   "Example: The previous fair was held in March of 2001  " & vbCrLf & _
'   "  In August 2001, you use this form to 'prepare' for the 2002 fair." & vbCrLf & _
'   "  FairYear must be set to 2001 since 'Maintenance' tasks work " & vbCrLf & _
'   "  on the data for 2001. " & vbCrLf & _
'   "IS " & fyear & " THE YEAR OF THE PREVIOUS FAIR? "
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
  Exit Sub
no_FairYearProperty:   'Create the Property 'FairYear' for this data base
  Dim db As DAO.Database
  Dim prop As DAO.Property
  fyear = GetYear()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set db = CurrentDb()
  Set prop = db.CreateProperty("FairYear", dbInteger, fyear)
  db.Properties.Append prop
  Resume ' same line that caused the error - have the property now
End Sub
